name: Hiddan Ojbexx Retchro
description:
To make Hiddan Ojbexx Retchro the best possible game we could, Shine Upon Thee and Jon Dixon Art Shoppe sat down together and analyzed all of the games currently available for PCs to see what seems to be the most popular with the kids these days. We discovered the following are definitely the most important aspects:

  • Retro pixel art
  • Hidden objects
  • Rock guitars
  • Player-driven storylines
  • Infinite replayability
  • Random levels
  • Detective stories
  • Low-resolution graphics
  • Keyboard and mouse controls
  • Fragrant disregard for grammar and spelling
  • DRM-free
  • Multi-platform

We're pleased to say that we spent many minutes of our lives coming up with a game that checks ALL of these points, and it's available for you to download - RIGHT NOW!

Please note: The screenshots are taken directly from gameplay, and no post-processing effects have been applied - it really does look this good!
